contents.text: Thank you for calling SpringML in the East Bay, your partner in accelerating time to insight and impact through data.
For data analytics and engineering services, press 1.
For data engineering and pipeline development, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a data engineering specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss building and optimizing our data pipelines.
I need help building a data pipeline to analyze veteran support program outcomes.
Optimize our data ingestion workflows and pipeline architecture.
I’m not very tech-savvy; I need help creating a simple data pipeline to combine my Excel spreadsheets.
I want to build a pipeline to process and transform my particle detector data.

contents.text: For business intelligence and reporting solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a business intelligence specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to set up and customize business intelligence dashboards.
I want to create a BI dashboard to track and report on veteran benefits usage.
Design scalable BI dashboards with real-time reporting.
I need someone to walk me through making a basic dashboard so I can view my monthly expenses.
I'd like to create a dashboard for reporting my experimental results.

contents.text: For artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions, press 2.
For AI strategy and consulting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an AI strategy consultant.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review our AI strategy and get expert consulting on next steps.
I’m looking for AI strategy advice on improving our veteran services with machine learning.
Discuss our AI implementation roadmap and model evaluation best practices.
I’d like advice on how to use AI for my small home business and what steps I should take first.
I need AI strategy advice to analyze my physics simulation data.

contents.text: For machine learning model deployment and support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our machine learning deployment team.

navigationGoals: I need assistance deploying a machine learning model into production.
I need assistance deploying a predictive ML model for identifying high-risk veterans.
Get support deploying ML models to production and setting up performance monitoring.
I already have a small prediction model and need help deploying it so I can actually use it.
I want help deploying my ML model for real-time anomaly detection in experiments.
